about_the_game:
Cubidle is an idle clicker game with various mechanics and gameplay possibilities. Destroy cubes to generate money, prestige and super points. Use each currency to buy upgrades, generators and other powerful features. Use all available resources to complete all difficulty tiers and collect all achievements.

DEMOVERSION

This demo version contains only a few basic mechanics. Just make sure if you like this kind of idle clicker gameplay or not. You can complete levels and buy/upgrade generators. But all your progress will be lost on exit
